titleStmt.title: The work and mercy of God conduceth to His praise, or, A demonstration of the visitation of Gods love to my soul in the dayes of my youth being a testimony of the light of Christ in the conscience ... / by a friend to all people ... William Bennitt.
titleStmt.author: Bennit, William, d. 1684.

notesStmt.note: "Written in Edmond Bury Common-Goal, the 11th moneth, 1667, William Bennitt"--p. 44.
Probable place of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
